job_tasks.phrase: act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering activity of working within agile teams to deliver client projects.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role in guiding and supporting other developers, a common software engineering task, within an AI/ML context.

job_tasks.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves mentoring and skill development for team members, a typical responsibility in a senior engineering role.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes client-facing work related to the implementation and strategy of ML solutions, which falls under integrating software capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Proficiency in writing and testing production-ready Python
job_tasks.justification: Writing and testing production-ready code is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Proficiency in Python and Javascript
job_tasks.justification: Proficiency in programming languages is a core requirement for software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining APIs is a key software integration and development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of MLOps best practices.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the operational aspects of managing ML systems in production.

job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions MLOps and DevOps, which are operational and pipeline-related tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: Understanding the underlying mathematics of ML algorithms is part of model development and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning specific ML toolkits and libraries falls under the development and application of ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience working with GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, Long Chain, etc...)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions GenAI tools and frameworks, indicating work with generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn
job_tasks.justification: These are traditional data science and ML libraries.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly requires a balance of core software engineering tasks (Python, Javascript, API development, MLOps) and AI/ML specialization. Crucially, it explicitly mentions GenAI tools (ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, LangChain) and vector databases, alongside traditional ML model development. The role involves hands-on engineering, client interaction, and mentoring, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile due to the blend of software engineering practices with specific Generative AI technologies.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly listing both core software engineering responsibilities and specific GenAI/ML technologies and tasks. The requirements align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
